title: Strange News: Orcas Attack, AI Writes Op-eds, and Portland Bans All Facial Recognition
itunes:title: Strange News: Orcas Attack, AI Writes Op-eds, and Portland Bans All Facial Recognition
description:
A pod of Orcas is attacking ships. An 'artificial intelligence' writes an op-ed. Portland, Oregon, bans facial recognition. All this and more in this week's Strange News.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
